= Introduction =

Fox Board G20 based autopilot for mulitrotor craft, from quadcopters to traditional helis


= Details =

I'm building my quadcopter:<br>
- 1 FoxBoard G20 400MHz 64MB RAM (€ 130)<br>
- 4 emax cf 2822 (€  30 4 x 2822 + 4 x ESC)<br>	
- 4 ESC unbranded<br>
- 1 Arduimu v2 (€ 80)<br>
- 1 minissc Pololu (€ 15)<br>
- 1 Turnigy 4500mah 3S 35~70C Lipo (€ 50)<br>
- 2 set APC Propeller 10x4.7 SF (€  7)<br>

<br>
Spare part aluminium: (€  6)<br>
- 1 aluminum square tube 1000x10x10mm cut and drilled<br> 
- 2 aluminum sheets opportunely cut and drilled<br>
